'''Mare Nostrum''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Rhapsodia in the Ancient Sea]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to light up the maps of [[Nostoi Region]] by activating the [[Statue of The Seven]].

==Trivia==
*The name of this achievement is Latin for {{w|Mare Nostrum|"our sea,"}} which is how the Romans referred to the Mediterranean Sea.
